summary: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.
cast: Steve Zahn|Timothy Olyphant|Milla Jovovich|Kiele Sanchez|Marley Shelton|Chris Hemsworth|Anthony Ruivivar|Dale Dickey|Peter Navy Tuiasosopo|Wendy Braun|Jim Cruz|Angela Sun|Leandra Gillis|Amit Yogev|Carlos Alberto Lopez|Katie Chonacas|Natalie Garza|Lindsay Halladay|Mercedes Leggett|Leif Riddell|Matt Birman|Tory Kittles|Brandon Ray Olive|Holt McCallany|Isaac Santiago|Gugun Deep Singh|Ryan Gesell|Evelyn Lopez|John T. Cogan|Michael Traynor|Spencer Hill|Mike Begovich|Elizabeth Maxwell|Sidney Howard|Katelin Chesna|Andy Hoff|Travis Willingham|Webster Williams|Cristina Soler|D. title: Escapada perfecta
